p: The plant parts used by pastorals for treatment include stems, flowers, seeds, fruits, roots, gums, leaves, and whole aerial parts, of which aerial parts (25%), leaves (24%), and fruits (24%,) were the most abundant parts used (Table 3). Medicinal uses of the species were divided into 16 different categories, of which the uses for digestive system (50% species), immune system (23% species), sedative (20% species) had the most frequencies (Table 3).
